text: "Thunder and Lightning" is a 1972 song by American singer and pianist Chi Coltrane. It was the first release from her eponymous debut album, peaking at No. 17 on the US Billboard Hot 100, No. 15 on Cash BoxCash Box Top 100 Singles, November 18, 1972 and No. 12 on Record World. It also charted at No. 18 on the Canadian RPM magazine singles chart. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Chart (1972) !
